=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Beauty Untouched Keratin Restorative Hair Serum 4oz
Review Date: 2022/01/08
Store: WAX BEAR
Product Description: ['This residue free non-greasy oil blend is formulated to smooth and nourish the hair while helping to detangle and defrizz. It is perfect for taming those loose fly aways and frizz, while helping to reduce damage from combing and brushing. For use before blow drying or styling hair and can be used throughout the day for touch-ups. Use after washing hair to seal in moisture or anytime your hair needs an extra boost.']
Average Rating: 4.8

description: This residue free non-greasy oil blend is formulated to smooth and nourish the hair while helping to detangle and defrizz. It is perfect for taming those loose fly aways and frizz, while helping to reduce damage from combing and brushing. For use before blow drying or styling hair and can be used throughout the day for touch-ups. Use after washing hair to seal in moisture or anytime your hair needs an extra boost.
